Class JettyHttpContainer

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler.Abstract
org.glassfish.jersey.jetty.JettyHttpContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Container, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable.DumpableContainer, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle, org.eclipse.jetty.util.thread.Invocable, Container
public final class JettyHttpContainer extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler.Abstract implements Container
Jersey Container implementation based on Jetty Handler.
Author:

    • doStart

      protected void doStart() throws Exception
      Inform this container that the server has been started. This method must be implicitly called after the server containing this container is started.
      Overrides:

      Throws:
